Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +32
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Two-handed Weapon With Buckler Penalty: -1 attack and AC
Banner: R60' Allies gain +3 save vs. fear and +2 charge attack when banner visible
Cavalier's Charge: +4 mounted charge attack/No AC penalty after mounted charge
Challenge: Self inflicts +3 HP damage on chosen foe and suffers -2 AC against other foes 1/dy
Coordinated Defense: +2 CMD (+4 vs. larger foe) when adjacent ally has same feat
Demanding Challenge: Challenged target suffers -2 AC on attacks by others
Order Of The Sword: +1 mounted attack vs. Challenge target
Paired Opportunists: +4 AOO and share ally AOO when adjacent ally has same feat and threatens same foe
Tactician: R30' May share Teamwork feat w/allies for 9 rd 3/dy
Throw Anything: No penalty for improvised ranged weapon, +1 attack w/thrown splash

Save Notes:

Wisdom Will Adjustment: +2
By My Honor: +2 chosen save unless alignment changes on chosen axis
Heart Of The Fields: May ignore fatigued or exhausted effect 1/dy
Well-Versed: +4 vs. bardic and sonic effects
Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 4 Spell DC: B: 13
Magic Notes:
Arcane Armor Training: Reduce armored casting penalty 10%
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1, B2, B3
Simple Somatics: No arcane spell failure in light armor
Arcane Spell Failure: 15%
Battle Magic: R60' Inspiring Command gives target +4 caster level and concentration checks
Complex Commands: May have 2 inspiring commands active simultaneously
Countersong: R30' Perform check vs. sonic magic while performing
Distraction: R30' Perform check vs. visual magic while performing
Easy March: Allies can hustle or force march w/out ill effects 4 hr/dy
Elemental Focus (Cold): +1 save DC on spells that inflict cold damage
Fascinate: R90' Hold 1 creatures spellbound while performing (DC 14 Will neg)
Inspire Courage: Allies +5 attack, damage, charm and fear saves while performing
Inspire Greatness: R30' 3 allies +2d10 HP, +2 attack, +1 Fortitude while performing
Inspire Hardiness: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies DR 4/-
Inspire Last Stand: R30' Allies below 0 HP remain conscious, stable, and able to act, and gain Inspire Courage effects if conscious
Inspired Tactics: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies +4 CMB, AC vs. combat maneuver AOO, and crit confirm
Keep Your Heads: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies +4 Will save and concentration checks
Merciful Spell: May cast spells to inflict nonlethal damage
Mockery: Bardic Performance inflicts -2 on target Charisma and Charisma-based skill checks
None Shall Fall: R60' Inspiring Command gives 4 allies additional +4 save vs. poison and 1d6 HP healing
Persistent Commands: May allow inspiring commands to continue for 3 rd while incapacitated
Pincer Maneuver: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies +4 AC vs. movement AOO and +4 attack and damage when flanking
Rally: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies additional +4 save vs. fear
Reveille: R60' Inspiring Command awakens allies and gives additional +4 save vs. exhaustion, fatigue, and sleep
Satire: Bardic Performance inflicts -1 on attack, damage, and saves vs. fear and charm on foes w/in hearing
Scatter: R60' Inspiring Command gives 4 allies 20% concealment when moving more than 5'
Shake It Off: R60' Inspiring Command gives target additional +4 vs. ongoing condition
Shielded Caster: +4 concentration when adjacent ally has same feat and no shield, +5 w/buckler or light shield, +6 w/heavy or tower shield/Suffer half concentration DC from foe Disruptive or similar feature
Sickening Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes sickened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Sound The Charge: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies +4 attack and damage and +20' charge speed
Sound The Retreat: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies 50% concealment with dbl move or withdraw action
Teamwork: R60' Inspiring Command gives allies +4 aid another rolls and effects
Tuck And Roll: Inspiring Command gives allies +4 Acrobatics and Ref saves
